text.headline: The Future is Unibright
text.text: Follow Unibright's journey with this interactive timeline that includes all milestones.

text.headline: Unibright crowd sale
text.text: 10 days after our crowd sale started, the last tokens were sold. We feel honoured and are aware of the great responsibility to set our vision alive â€” bringing blockchain technology to the enterprise world. We are all convinced (more than ever) we will be part of something big.
